title: logo font - please help ID!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lemontree_small_4111.jpg)

Anyone recognize this font?? Any help is greatly appreciated!

thanks!

Font: 

 Sansation 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064211/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: terapr0

comments.content:
If **Lemon** and Tree are the same font family then perhaps 'Carnova'  
If the designer used two fonts, **Lemon** may be 'Core Sans Bold'  
and Tree perhaps 'Norpeth Medium'

Kind Regards,

Michiel

Hard to say, very generic and neutral, nothing really distinctive... [Crique Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064211/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stawix/crique-grotesk) might work as well... Your best chance is probably to track down this graphic and ask directly the author.

EDIT: after further inspection, [Sansation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064211/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/sansation) might match.

wow, you guys are good!  
I was able to track down the original file, and you're right - it was Sansation and Sansation Light
